name: .WLU File Extension
summary: Learn about .WLU files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To install the unofficial Windows update included in a WLU file, you must first download and decompress WLUpdator. Then, you must drag your WLU file to wlupdate.vbe, which will begin the Windows update process.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
